title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Bring your students to Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial. Find Resources for planning your trip including fee waiver information, ranger programs and more. All Field Trips   Field Trips    Field Trips Learn More     Guest Speakers If you would want a park ranger to come to your school or your organization to give a program here is where you need to look.
